name: Disney's Winnie the Pooh: Preschool
description:
Winnie the Pooh and his friends help preschoolers "think, think, think" as they journey through The 100 Acre Wood. They'll cook alphabet soup in Kanga's kitchen, count vegetables from Rabbit's garden, visit Pooh's Echo Tree for a lesson in foreign language and attend a birthday celebration for Eeyore! With each new activity, preschoolers can build important learning skills including sequencing, categorization and phonics. It's a fun-filled learning adventure for all!

Introduces children to Spanish and French foreign language vocabulary
Builds 20 fundamental learning skills
Adjustable skill levels allow children to learn at their own pace.
Printable workbook and flashcards reinforce key lessons
Progress reports boost confidence by displaying a child's growth.
